verse:
ब्रह्मण्यानां बलिरहं वीराणामहमर्जुनः ।
भूतानां स्थितिरुत्पत्तिरहं वै प्रतिसङ्क्रमः ॥

terms.brahmaṇyānām: of those dedicated to brahminical culture
terms.baliḥ: Bali Mahārāja, the son of Virocana

vedabase.translation: Among those dedicated to brahminical culture I am Bali Mahārāja, the son of Virocana, and I am Arjuna among heroes. Indeed, I am the creation, maintenance and annihilation of all living entities.

terms.ब्रह्मण्यानां: of those who possess knowledge of the supreme reality (Brahman)

bard.meaning: I am the power of brahmins, Arjuna is the strength of heroes, existence of beings, birth and return
